channel.title: The Book of Predictions - 1800's
channel.description:
[center]Welcome, i'm going to make this thread for the discussions of others on 'The Book of Predictions' wrote in the 1800's. The book states a variety of predictions that have happened or a going to happen within our life-time.
[size=14pt]Predicted[/size]
[i]World wars Motor-vehicles Global warming 9/11 Area 51[/i]
[size=14pt]Predictions[/size]
[i]2012 - Comet clips earth. 2013 - Comet clips earth. 2017 - Ability to travel the speed of light (Element 115) 2021 - UFO crashes/lands. 2023 - Headwaves of 40-50 degrees. 2027 - Comet of 30 miles long has a direct impact on earth. 2030 - Alien invasion[/i]
Don't believe me? [url=http://www.google.co.uk/]Google[/url] it.[/center]

item.title: The Book of Predictions - 1800's
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:14, topic:280055”][quote author=sinri94 link=topic=369628.msg2798472#msg2798472 date=1243219714]

my predictions are there will be world war 3…our next president will be senator palin and we will all die
basically…our future sucks!

It’s terrible enough that we have a nigger for a president.

i have to disagree with u on that, Obama is probaly the best president ever, the economy is terrible yes, but obama will make it alright!
[/quote]
What the hell are you talking about? Obama has done nothing but spend trillions of dollars and ruin the country. His little joke he calls Obama care is fucking retarded.[/quote]

If you knew anything about economics, you’d realize that the only way out of a recession is to spend.

Also, traveling at the speed of light for any particle with more mass than a photon… lol?

Read full topic

item.title: The Book of Predictions - 1800's
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

USA’s economy is already shit. Within the next few years there will most likely be big debates within countries and some retard will fire on one country, causing another country to attack back, making other countries get involved in the action. Which will eventually end up into the end of the world, known as the ‘nuclear holocaust’. That’s my ‘predictions’.

Read full topic

item.title: The Book of Predictions - 1800's
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:5, topic:280055”][quote author=SonGoku link=topic=369628.msg2797042#msg2797042 date=1243125188]

The Book of Predictions was a book published in 1980 and written by David Wallechinsky, Amy Wallace, and Irving Wallace, the authors of The Book of Lists. Written in the same type of style (i.e., lists), it includes lists of predictions by scientists, science fiction authors, politicians, and others. Other contents include:

It’s not hard to ‘predict’ something.

Here, I’ll do it now.

Within 100 years electricity will be over 9000 dollars a volt.
[/quote]
No it won’t. Electricity will be much less, as we progress with more energy efficient methods, and within hundred years, some smart cookie will find out nuclear fusion.[/quote]

You live in a capitalistic society. Prices do not go down.

Read full topic
